roleset.name: plot, think, solve a problem, come up with an answer

example.name: all args
example.text: Analysts calculate Cray Computer's initial book value at about $4.75 a share.

example.name: no attribute
example.text: He calculates that the recent market slide translated into a 5% to 7% reduction in IPO proceeds to companies.
example.arg: that the recent market slide translated into a 5% to 7% reduction in IPO proceeds to companies

roleset.note: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus; adjectival 'calculating' based on BOLT-6. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'think'

example.name: Adjectival rel: calculating
example.text: Pingan is the most calculating -- they will avoid compensating if they can ; they will under - compensate if they can ; they are the most strict with identifications and documents ; their company has a strict management system .
